author: lordChu
title: ME experience
text: I had the chance to stay in this cool hotel for the week end!the room was lovely,the view enchanting But Who made this experience unforgettable has been the staff especially simona from "aura" and Andrea from front office...a particolar thanks to Riccardo for the birthday message.Each everyone of you made our birthday trip A"ME"zing!
